title: Add Advanced Notification System with Multi-Channel Support
description:
Problem: The current notification system only supports WebSocket real-time updates, limiting user accessibility and professional integration. Users cannot receive notifications via email, SMS, or third-party platforms like Slack/Microsoft Teams.

Requirements:
- Implement email notifications for task assignments, status changes, and deadlines
- Add SMS notifications for high-priority task updates
- Integrate with Slack and Microsoft Teams for task notifications
- Create user notification preferences management
- Add daily/weekly digest emails
- Implement notification templates and customization
- Support @mentions and direct messaging
- Add notification history and management interface

Evidence: Review of daemon.ts:18-21 shows only WebSocket manager, task-monitor.ts:144-164 has basic notification hooks but no external channels, dashboard.ts shows no notification settings UI.

Impacted files:
- src/daemon.ts (add notification TCP commands)
- src/web/dashboard.ts (add notification preferences UI)
- src/services/ (create notification-service.ts)
- Create notification templates and integration modules

Testing notes:
- Unit tests for notification service delivery
- Integration tests for email/Slack/Microsoft Teams
- UI tests for notification preferences management
- End-to-end tests for notification workflows
